We reiterate our political and economic support for #Ukraine:  €750mn disbursed so far, #AssocAgreement completed last week.

I want all Ghanaian children to have the same opportunities available to them to rise to their highest potential.
I want all of our children to feel entitled to the habit of asking for more, and confident in the knowledge that it can be attained.
I envision the same success and prosperity for this nation that you envision.
This is our country, our home, and all Ghanaians deserve to have the ability to live, work and raise our families here with dignity n pride
I am committed to working in the best interests of all citizens.
I have not forgotten that one of the greatest virtues of leadership is the ability to listen.
I want to assure you that we will create change. We will build the sort of country that we will be proud to hand down to our children.

Today, Guatemala received the certification of the Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative (EITI).
With the certification of the (EITI), Guatemala became the first country in Central America and the second in Latin America to obtain it.
As a country we are proud to be validated as a State that complies with the initiative (EITI). http://t.co/q7FOgT8Qip
Guatemala welcomes the recognition and is committed to continue working for transparency and the fight against corruption

Brothers and sisters After the blessing of the President of the State, may God protect him, we announce a ministerial reshuffle in the UAE government, including the Ministries of Education and Justice.
Hussein Bin Ibrahim Al Hammadi, Minister of Education, and Brother Sultan bin Saeed Al Badi, Minister of Justice, have been appointed. I wish them success in serving the homeland.
The two new ministers of the UAE youth who are recognized for their competence and achievement .. I welcome them in the work team .. and more on their hands to keep pace with our development march
The former team of the two ministries have done their duty to serve their country and their country, and their dedication during their tenure will remain the place of all thanks and appreciation.
